website_summaries.verdict: This option is a decent all-around affordable kit that will work with a wide range of watches.
pros: 151 pieces in all, including multiple sizes of replacement spring pins
Both screwdrivers and tweezers are anti-magnetic
52mm case opener can handle over-sized watches
cons: Some buyers report problems with flimsy screwdrivers and other tools

customer_reviews.title: This was just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I received my watch repair kit in record time. It was very easy to use. As you can see from the above photo I was able to remove links from my watch effortlessly, and make other necessary adjustments. This worked perfectly. As someone who buys and collects watched this was a must have and I am very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K. Mondy

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value! I had several watches that needed new batteries, and decided to buy the kit since the jewelers are charging $15 -$20 now to change batteries. The most useful pieces to me are the jig that can be used to hold the watch case, and the back pry-off tool. I probably won't use everything in the case. Manufacturing workmanship of the tools is adequate. I recommend this product. HINT: I'd look for a model-specific battery replacement video on YouTube before opening the watch case. I learned that the battery holding mechanisms vary from brand to brand and their workings are not always obvious. I replaced three watch batteries today with no casualties!
customer_reviews.author: Tad A. Schell

customer_reviews.title: The kit has everything you could possibly need!
customer_reviews.text: What an excellent value!! I ordered this kit to change some batteries on my watches the kit comes with everything you need and more. Between the kit and the batteries I spent less than $25. That's less then the cost of having 2 batteries replaced at my local jeweler. Super fast shipping and a great product!! 5 stars for shure!
customer_reviews.author: Langhorne 1

customer_reviews.title: So worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: You can imagine how frustrating it can be every time you want you watch battery replaced and rob with with those outrageous prices. Well, with this product, you can do it yourself. Just buy the right type of battery in amazon and you can be your own watch repair expert. Saves you a ton of money. Everything looks sturdy enough to last a lifetime. I was able to replace the batteries a few watches me and my wife own and it was a fraction compared to what I would have spent if I had it done on the mall. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Paragados

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING WATCH REPAIR KIT
customer_reviews.text: This tool kit is an outstanding value - has all of the tools necessary to remove all types of watch backs, replace/remove watch bands and links - extra added touch are the instructions and the included assortment of band pins. Very versatile and perfect for home users to work on watches without having to resort to taking to a jeweler for everyday "repairs". Highly recommended for anyone that needs/wants to work on watches. I am restoring/repairing watches for personal, family, friends and re-sale - PERFECT tool kit !!!
customer_reviews.author: robin lynn

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch repair kit last week and got the chance to use it on my sons watch today. Reducing the watch's bracelet was a breeze with the included base and pin remover, i was very pleased with the help these tools gave me. The kit itself arrived as described to the last piece and on time. I will be changing the batteries of some of the family watches next week so i will update this review if I encounter any problems.
customer_reviews.author: ams

customer_reviews.title: Tripod opener damaged, hammer , watch holder and pliers were used, dirty and badly scratched up
customer_reviews.text: Long single adjuster on tripod opener won't turn to allow adjustment. The hammer, pliers and watch holder arrived badly scratched, dirty and obviously very used! This product is unacceptable !!
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Ruined my watch instead of fixing it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to fix two watches. I started with the first, it got ruined, because the pins in the band was stuck and the tools that come in this repair kit were so cheat that, they either bent or broke! Now I have a ruined watch, since I can't take the pin out of the band nor can I use it! Since some of the parts are broken, probably I'm not able to return it back. Complete waste of money and regret paying a cent on this!
customer_reviews.author: Cozmo

customer_reviews.title: Good Repair Kit for Cheap Watches
customer_reviews.text: Directions for use minimal. You know just enough to be an incompetent watch repair rookie. Lots of tools. The prying tools are fine. Yes it is easy to pry open a cheap $20 watch...but the tools for unscrewing the back of an expensive watch DO NOT WORK. POORLY MADE WITH NO FINE ADJUSTMENTS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional quality and packaging for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to believe the level of quality, including the handy carrying case, that can be had for this price. I've used the tools several times to replace a watch bracelet, size a new watch and replace batteries in a couple of quartz watches. The tools seem sufficiently sturdy for the job and manufacturing quality seems top notch. The carrying case keeps all the tools in a compact enclosure, albeit at the cost of making removal and replacement of the tools a bit difficult; easy to understand given the quantity of tools and the compact design of the case. At a price of under $20 this tool set has already paid for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Numbers Guy

customer_reviews.title: Much nicer than expected
customer_reviews.text: First, the zipper case was much heavier duty than expected and a good strong zipper. The precision screwdrivers are more sturdy than the set I’ve had for years. I had been struggling with getting pins out of my watchband for 2 days using needles and thumbtacks with no luck. My wrist just isn’t that strong. Used this tool and had it out in no time. The tri-point wrench made getting the back off the watch easy too. I think it includes everything I could possibly want to work on my watches. I might buy one for my brother since I feel these are quality tools.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Muffet

customer_reviews.title: Great it is exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I’m someone that has far to many watches. I’m definitely a watch addict I’ll be the first to admit it. I just got tired of always having to take my new watches in to get the bands adjusted. It’s time consuming and expensive and because of that I bought this kit. It worked great as I purchased to new watches and adjusted the watch bands myself. I think this kit is also good for easy quick repairs that I’ve done to some old watches I was planning to take to the jewelers. I think most watch addicts or collectors would be able to use this for quick adjustments and easy repairs
customer_reviews.author: TallGuySC

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely brilliant kit
customer_reviews.text: I was able to open the back of my Bulvoa Precisionist in minutes after getting the kit. The dial had slipped and I was able to disassemble to realign it. I was also able to change the band in 5 minutes and a 24mm diver-style with side lugs is not easy. Very happy I bought it. just being able to change the battery was worth the kit - the local Jarrods charges twice this to change mine. Only thing is the included pins and pretty thin, so I used the pins that came with the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Guy in AZ

customer_reviews.title: No better kit to have if you have watches...
customer_reviews.text: I read on on of the previous reviews that the value to buy this kit compared to the money spent to have a watch repair store replace your battery and that resonated with me. While I don't expect to go replacing everyone's batteries now that I have this kit I can say with confidence that the removal and replacement of watch covers and batteries is now within my skill set. I like the fact that this kit can service pratically any and all watches that I have, now or in the future with maybe those watches that I own that are rechargable. A great kit to own and have at the ready for all of my future needs.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Recommendation: You'll also need to purchase Watch Press & Magnifier Glasses!
customer_reviews.text: The canvas case is on the smallish side but once you unzip it you notice it's loaded with the necessary tools you'll need to service your Watches. My Wife immediately handed me two watches she needed batteries for. Getting the batteries out was moderately easy. Could have been a lot easier but I just could not see where the groove was (too tiny). Once I replaced the batteries, I could not seal the cover back on! I tried various methods recommended by YouTube (nothing worked!) I then went ahead and ordered the Ohehu Watch Press and Voila! I also ordered the Yoctuson Magnifier Glasses and now my set is complete!
customer_reviews.author: bam

customer_reviews.title: DIY Rules!
customer_reviews.text: I only occasionally need help with a watch but I noticed in my watch case at home most of my watch batteries have expired. Also, I sell and give away promotional watches and those batteries had expired as well. This is an amazing kit and the full color directions booklet was impressive. I have probably saved myself a couple hundred dollars by being able to do my own battery replacement let alone watch band modifications. Super cool.
customer_reviews.author: doodinvegas

customer_reviews.title: More than expected and excellent tools content for the money
customer_reviews.text: I expected that this tool kit would be of average quality based upon its advertised cost, but it proved to be much better quality than expected. I needed a tool to open the back of battery powered wrist watches, but this tool kit offered that tool and more for slightly more than just the tool alone from other vendors. This tool kit offers good quality tools and accessories that are a great value for the price. I can now combine the tools of this kit with those from the Invicta tool kit I already have, and they allow me to have access to every tool I need to work with my wrist watch collection; both battery powered and self winding.
customer_reviews.author: Walter E. Hersey, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool kit for changing a watch battery.
customer_reviews.text: This kit contains just about everything needed to change a battery on many different kinds and styles of watches. The only thing it does not contain is a case press for replacing a pop-off case. It was reasonably priced and the instructions are decent. I figure that by changing my own battery, it will cost me a little over $20 the first time including $5 for a six pack of batterie and free for the next five times. The charge for changing a battery at the watch kiosk in my local mall is $25. That's a net savings of over $125 by changing my own battery.
customer_reviews.author: lental

customer_reviews.title: A great value, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I was quite pleased with this product. I commonly buy my wife a new watch every Christmas and, because of her wrist size, need to remove a link or two. In the past I literally was using a standard ball peen hammer and a brad. This year, I decided to purchase the right tool for the job. There is a height-adjustable platform for the watch to rest on when you line up the pin for removal. The platform wouldn't go as high as I needed it to, which is why I gave it a 4-star rating vice 5. I will probably have to glue something to the surface for future use. It just doesn't adjust enough.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: A good inexpensive tool kit for maintaining your watch
customer_reviews.text: I got this mostly so I could change the battery in one of my watches that had a pry-off back. It’s amazing how many tools fit into this little case. The quality is what you’d expect for an inexpensive Chinese-made set - it all works fine but isn’t super high grade metals or super tight tolerance machine threads. But for as often as the average person has to take care of things on a watch, this is great value. I’ll never have to gather up various tools to change a battery or adjust a band and it’s nice to use tools that are more suited to the task.
customer_reviews.author: T. Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Overall I liked this repair kit
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try and find a watch repair kit to replace the batteries in my two watches. I needed the ratcheted tool for one and a flat back remover for the other. The ratchet tool was great and there are multiple sized tips to choose from. The flat back tool that worked for me was the yellow one shown. The knife one didn't work too well but the yellow one worked first try. I was able to change batteries in both fairly quickly after having never done it before. I wish it had come with a cloth to set watches on but I had a microfiber one already.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Braz

customer_reviews.title: Almost the total package rite here.. But still 5 🌟
customer_reviews.text: I use this tool kit for my invicta watches and my glasses very nice kit.. But One thing in the pic the crown do not fit in the one case to open the watch.. But it work for every thing else on my invicta watches
customer_reviews.author: Joe S jr

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Watch Repair Kit!
customer_reviews.text: I shortened two watch bands, replaced a band and put new batteries in 11 watches in an afternoon. Super happy with this kit. The watch band remover gizmo broke during use on the first band, but you really don’t need it with the pin removers and hammer. I do suggest you watch a YouTube or two before you start whacking away. And KEEP your pins, the kit pins are for attaching bands to the face - not for reattaching links together. I saved a TON of money doing this myself and it was fun playing with the tiny tools and doing it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Margie Pargie

customer_reviews.title: watch repair tools
customer_reviews.text: ordered the watch repair tool and Amazon made a quick delivery. Used the tools to repair 5 watches in one day. Delivery of the tools was quick. All 5 watches are now repaired and working. Instructions are helpful. Only needed a magnifying device to aid in the repair. The only concern is that there are tiny pieces and there was a container for the spare teeth for the watch opener, but no case(s) for the spring parts and spare pins. These loose parts could easily be lost over a period of time. One or two tiny containers are needed. Really helped in the repair of 5 watches in the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Purdon.

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for basic watch maintenance
customer_reviews.text: It's a lot of stuff. But you count the pins as a huge chunk of that. Overall its a good package. The larger tools are of good quality. It took me a little bit of work to get the backplate off of my watch. It might have been better to go with one of the tool sets that uses two prongs instead of 3. I dropped a star because one of the pin drivers was loose and came apart. You can't get a replacement for just that. I didn't want to send the whole thing back for a small driver pin though. Otherwise, very reasonable for everything.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hook

customer_reviews.title: Invaluable Toolset
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Unless you own an automatic watch, there will be times where one needs to open up the back of your watch to replace a battery, maybe on several timepieces. Also, other included tools will allow you to work on other aspects of your timepieces. Without using the instructions, I intuitively used what I specifically needed to get the job. If need be, with time permitting, I can work on repairing/replacing watches. It is a fascinating hobby that I've discovered. Be well. Ravi Peiris M.D.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Peiris M.D.

customer_reviews.title: ORDER IT!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because I had a few watch bands that I needed to adjust and to change out some batteries. I am not watch expert but when I first used the tools in the kit, it was so easy to use. I repaired three watches in about 20 minutes with zero issues. This kit will be useful in the future, a lot of product for a decent price. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: So happy I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: Instead of selling my watch collection due to time and expense (and pain in the arse) to change out 15 or so watch batteries I can now do it myself. I have adjusted multiple bands also. The only issue I have had So far is the yellow handled watch back ‘pryer’ edge chipped pretty bad opening one watch. Although I got it open it probably won’t make it another round. Maybe the seller will see this and send me another one. Most of my watches are screw back so I’d think about that if yours snap close.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Smith

customer_reviews.title: Must have for watch wearers!
customer_reviews.text: Good kit for the price. For the price you pay it’s amazing that you even get the great assorted spring bars without mentioning the case back removal tool. The case back removal tool was the main reason for purchasing this kit but for sure the other tools are handy. Yes the tools are not too quality and have a little slop in their movements but they all work sufficiently. You just have to be careful and be patient when working with watches regardless of the tools or else you will scratch/break something. Very happy with this kit!
customer_reviews.author: Epiphone

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little, “ must have” kit for any tinkering or watch collectors. I repaired five watches within one hour of receiving this kit. It paid for itself in 20 minutes ( that is how long it took to replace three watch batteries myself saving an expensive trip to the watch repair guy). Kit has almost everything you need to work on you watch. This is especially true if you take some time to watch some timepiece repair videos on YouTube. That were I learned about this kit.
customer_reviews.author: H.E. TyreeTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kit for the money
customer_reviews.text: I like to tinker and save myself a little money at the same time. Between my wife and I we had about 6 watches with batteries that had been dead for years. This kit did the trick. I was able to easily take the backs off of all the watches (both the 'pop off' type and screw off type). The tools also made it easy to remove and replace the batteries. I also needed some replacement spring loaded stems for a couple of watch bands and this kit had multiple sizes which worked great. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: mikey41

customer_reviews.title: The skill you didn't know you were missing out on!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit because it is cheaper than taking 10 watches to the watch repairman and it did not disappoint. For less than $30 I changed all ten batteries and repaired posts and links on several in less than an hour! Totally worth the money and learned a neat skill to help someone else!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought a kit that was horrible on here before so my expectation for this kit was low. But it turned out to be pretty good. The quality is no Burgeon but it will definitely get the job done with no issue. And it has everything you need to open a case, change bracelet, replace battery or bezel. There are several same “tips” so when one breaks you have replacements handily.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Money Saver - Change your own batteries
customer_reviews.text: This is an inexpensive way to save money rather than paying someone to replace your batteries. I prefer high end Seiko quartz watches to mechanical for two reason, time keeping and reliability. I have about a dozen Quartz watches, it can get pricey paying $25-$35 to have someone change a battery even if it is only every 3 years or so. I bought this inexpensive kit and watch batteries are cheap and I am already saving money. Well worth the price for anyone who owns multiple watches. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Greg R Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Saved money by doing the job myself.
customer_reviews.text: A jeweler wanted $18 per watch to shorten the links. I saved with the first watch and ended up shortening 2 more. Worked great for removing some links from a few different watches. I ran into one watch that had far too tight of pins and I bent some trying but that was the watches fault but they give you backups for the main pins. There was one pin that didn't have any backups unfortunately so I should have looked before attempting hammer the pin out. There's more than I should need in this kit and it has already saved me money.
customer_reviews.author: Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I got this so I could change my own watch batteries and not have to go to the jeweler. Well, it does exactly that. The tools are easy to use and very sturdy. And I paid for the price of the tools with the first battery I replaced. A win-win. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Larry

customer_reviews.title: Watch Tool Kit
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent tool kit for working on watches. I have used it several times since the purchase. Have worked on my family watches and watches from a few of my friends. I'm their handyman. I've been able to do the repairs the watches needed with ease. This tool kit is the bomb. Wish I would've had one of these a long time ago. Well worth the money. Anyone who likes to work on watches or even other small mechanical/electronic items. It kit IS IT!! Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Husker

customer_reviews.title: This kit is saving me a fortune!
customer_reviews.text: This has turned out to be a gem of a kit! This kit has everything I’ve needed so far to adjust links and change batteries. It’s already saved me a fortune in battery replacement costs. I’ve used it on most of mine, my wife’s, and my mother’s watches with great success. This kit seems to be more than adequate for any work I need to do on my watches and it was an unbeatable price for what it’ll save me in repair costs! Happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: HEATHER  D SYLVESTER

customer_reviews.title: Very handy kit for simple repairs
customer_reviews.text: While my father-in-law was a jeweler, I am not...and since his passing away several years ago, I have to rely on others for simple watch repairs, such as replacing batteries. This kit has all the tools to perform those simple repairs. After receiving it with 2-day shipping, I have replaced batteries in my Seiko and Accutron watches. The tools appear to be better quality and, for my limited repair, were just what I needed. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mister T

customer_reviews.title: For simple jobs only
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap, ok for what you spend. If you just want to change some watch batteries this set will work. If you want to do ANY serious watch repair, save your money. You need pro grade tools for real work, so save up, do some moonlighting, do whatever it takes to afford proper tools. They never are cheap, but they're way cheaper than the damage you might do using these types. A little knowledge is a dangerous thing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Fantastic Bargain for The Casual Watch Enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: Professional watchmaking tools can get very expensive. For those of us that occasionally have to replace a battery and make minor repairs there is no reason to purchase high end tools. This kit, although not as nice as the professional stuff, has everything you need to do all the normal things. I've only had the kit 2 days and I've already worked on 3 of my watches. This probably saved me $200/$300 in repair costs! For the price, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: branzig

customer_reviews.title: A good value and a practical tool set to own
customer_reviews.text: Every once in awhile I have to work on a watch. Either the battery needs replacing or the wrist band needs work. Always a problem because I didn't have the correct tools. This kit solves that problem. While I haven't used it yet, I think this is something every one can use. It appears to be of good quality and has enough tool options to handle most watch repairs that a regular person would want to tackle on their own. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: everything you will need to adjust your watch
customer_reviews.text: I was a jewelry store manager for 10 years, we adjusted watch bands and replaced batteries. We used all different kinds of tools to preform this. This kit in a very nice zippered case is has a very easy access to each tool you will need. Wish every associate had one of these to use it would have been more of a help instead of the constant loss of tools. This package has way more tools than we had. They all work very well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Zack

customer_reviews.title: What a great collection?
customer_reviews.text: This watch kit has everything you could need to work on your watch. Removing batteries is a cinch with the tools provided in the kit. The shipment was speedy! I had 5 watches that needed new batteries and all have had them replaced here at my house. The batteries were ordered easily online. I am so pleased to have my own watch repair kit. I plan to replace to bands next and I have just the tools I need.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Limited Functionality Crumby Screwdrivers
customer_reviews.text: I had to go to Depot to buy a set of micro screwdrivers because the ones that came with the kit are worthless. Most of the tools in the kit are worthless and of low quality. The plastic block came in handy as well as the strap tool. Buying them separate would be around the cost of the entire kit. It is so cheap what do you expect. Don't count on being able to use the screw drivers. They are really crumby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VASTER WATCH REPAIR KIT
customer_reviews.text: Received the Vaster watch repair kit in order the change out watch batteries. That said I have replaced 2 batteries so far, one in a simple "easy to remove" watch back, and the other in a dive watch which requires the special 3 point opener to remove the back. I found the 3 point opener to be a little "loose" in the adjustments but managed to open and close the case using it. Overall I am satisfied with the kit and expect it to be used a couple of times a year replacing various watch batteries. Please note the kit comes with various tools to remove and replace watch bands and links also.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Guillory

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not very good Customer Service stinks. Parts of this kit are not well made and useless. It is okay for something quick but, do not expect anything to be easy using this. Contacted support because they sent a generic email asking how I am liking the kit. I replied days ago and they are too busy to thank me or anything else such as apologize for the inconvenience. Buy a better kit from someone else
customer_reviews.author: Data

customer_reviews.title: Everything you'll ever need to fix a watch.
customer_reviews.text: This kit has everything you might ever need to fix a watch. I was struggling with 5 watches (old, stuffed in jewelry drawer for years) that had totally different backs, batteries, and problems with getting inside them. Within an hour after getting this kit I had everything fixed. Was also able to get the back off of a Swiss Army watch (and fix it) rather than senr it to the company for repairs. Best purchase I've made in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Smith

customer_reviews.title: All The Tools Needed
customer_reviews.text: This is a very complete kit - except for the instructions, which are not. It worked to open the case of a watch I needed to replace the battery in, but nothing worked to put the case back together. I ended up tossing the watch and new battery - neither was of any use if the case back could not be re-installed. The instructions did not give any clue as to how to accomplish that part of the operation.
customer_reviews.author: Silver City Slim

customer_reviews.title: Paid for Itself After First Use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit to replace a battery in my mother's watch. She took it to a few places, and after hearing how much they wanted, I told her I could do it myself.....with the right tool(s). A few days later, I received this kit and had the new battery installed within 30 minutes. Tools seem to be robust and should last a while. Though I may not use it often, this kit definitely paid for itself the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good Investment!
customer_reviews.text: This tool kit is sufficient for a casual user to do his/her own watch adjustments and battery changes. The purchase of this watch tool kit was based upon seeing a friend change the batteries on my two quartz watches and then remove links from another watch that was just purchased. I was surprised when informed about the cost of the kit itself, as two battery changes at a discounted jeweler's ($8.00 for labor and the battery) already equals the price of the tool kit. There are no small print detailed instructions but rather, simple easy-to-follow pictures and instructions. A surprise was a small zip-lock bag containing various sizes of push pins. I highly recommend the Vastar Watch Repair Kit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great selection of tools, difficult storage in case
customer_reviews.text: THE GOOD The selection of tools is excellent and the overall quality is good. NEEDS IMPROVEMENT Adjusting the three point watch back vise is difficult because of the slop in the screw mechanisms. They should be much more snug to allow a setting to be retained The elastic bands holding the tools in place work well for most of the tools, but are difficult to use for some items.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Nifty Kit
customer_reviews.text: Received this watch repair kit this week and have not used it yet. Looking forward to do my own repairs to my wifes and my watches as a jeweler that I know may be retiring and I really do not going to the mall to have the Batteries and links removed would be very high priced as I have done before. The prices to remove links and replace batteries has gone way up. The vastar repair kit looks and fells sturdy. For the price I think it will suffice.
customer_reviews.author: Whiskers

customer_reviews.title: Alot of repair potential in one kit
customer_reviews.text: I watched a jeweler remove the back of my watches to replace its battery and knew I could do the same for less cost. I was happy to follow the lead of a watch blogger to find this repair kit. So far, I've replaced batteries in two watches, for a fraction of the price paid to the jeweler. The elastic bands holding the repair tools is very snug, which makes removing then replacing each item a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Marc L.

customer_reviews.title: Chinese-made garbage
customer_reviews.text: It would really be nice if a US company actually made something like this out of quality material. I would hate to know the lead content in this set. I bought this to remove a link from a metal watch band. The link remover broke twice as I attempt to get a single link off. Probably why they include replacement pins, knowing that that they're flimsy. The link remover also rubbed off a strange metallic dust on my fingers while attempting to use. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not useful for G-Shock battery changes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased so I could change batteries in my G-Shock watches. Unfortunately, the kit contains numerous duplicates of the same tool but not much variety between tool.s There are three flat tip screwdrivers in nearly identical sizes, but no Phillips head. The advertised "151 pieces" there are 19 unique items, the balance of the 151 is made up of duplicates of those 19.
customer_reviews.author: W. Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Pretty impressive for the price
customer_reviews.text: Includes an impressive amount of accessories. I only used a few to remove the back of my watch, install a battery, replace the o-ring and re-install the back cover. It was a bit tricky at first, but the gunk in the back made it a tough task. After cleaning this with care it wouldn't go inside the watch, lubricating the o-ring and side of the cover the task was straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Saves money and very convenient
customer_reviews.text: To have this just for adjusting watchbands makes it worth much more than it costs. That you can use it to remove watch backs and replace batteries doubles the value. This is one of those "guy things" that you'll keep around for a couple years, lose it-find it, and then say, "Boy, am I glad I have this all these years later. Yay!!!" Oh, and if you don't know how to use it, YouTube watch repair videos.
customer_reviews.author: T. M. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy!
customer_reviews.text: The piece that takes the back of the watch off broke. I’m getting ready to send it back!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: I wish they included instruction manual with the kit. It took me quite a bit of research to figure out how to use some of the tools as a novice to remove the links of the watch band. Had plenty of stuff in the kit, not sure what it is used for yet...
customer_reviews.author: Adam Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kit - fixed all my watch batteries
customer_reviews.text: Turns out the big wrench looking tool is a little trickier to use than anticipated but it did the job. The yellow handled tool works super for prying up the watch backs that don't screw on. However, getting those back on was a bit tricky as well. Batteries are pretty inexpensive so this kit saved me a bundle over taking my 3-5 watches to the mall for new batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Big Coug

customer_reviews.title: Nice price and lots of tools!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product to be able to change our own watch batteries (that we can also order online) and do simple jewelry and watch repairs without having to take these items to a jeweler. There are lots of tools in this kit and the directions are ok. The pictures in the little pamphlet are ok but could use some more word instructions to go along. Can definitely tell this is a foreign product but what we needed it for and have used it for already we would recommend this product. Nice set to have around and handy!
customer_reviews.author: P. Beauch

customer_reviews.title: One of the few times where I feel I got more than I paid for.
customer_reviews.text: This kit quite literally paid for itself and more already. Bought it for my wife's two bulova watches as she has an extremely tiny wrist. I was even able to talk my 18 year old son through the process over the phone using this kit on a watch for his friend. I'm sure there are more professional kits, but for a person at home, you don't need more than this.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great watch repair kit!
customer_reviews.text: As somebody who owns many watches, I got tired of spending $10-$20 each time I needed to adjust a strap or replace a battery. Purchased this kit with no prior watch maintenance experience, and with the help of a few youtube videos I was quickly able to figure out how to do some basic tasks. This kit has saved me a good bit of money, and helped me develop a new skill!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great toolkit for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I like the amount of tools in this tool kit, and the little manual that describes how to use them. Easy explained with readable pictures and text. Only 4 stars, because the hammerhead came off the handle the moment i used it. Was easy to fix with epoxy glue, that's why i didn't return it. I would recommend this kit to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Real Man

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have been paying $20 a pop at my local jeweler for watch battery changes. I have 3 that need batteries now and decided to invest in doing myself. This kit makes it so easy and worked on all three; each a different size and mechanism for opening the back. I had everything I needed. I even used it to adjust a watch band length too. Wish I had purchased this years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Took

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and saved me a lot of money
customer_reviews.text: The kit comes complete with what you need to change batteries, links and other minor repairs without taking it to jewelry shop and spending a small fortune on repairs. I have saved over $125 on battery service alone with this kit. I changed 4 watch batteries and the price of the kit was less than one battery change at store. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Powers

customer_reviews.title: Comes in handy
customer_reviews.text: This kit has many useful tools. I have used almost all of them at one point or another. The metal seems to be well made and a good material because the thin flathead drivers, or the watch back remover have not bent yet. I have had the product for about a year now. I don't use the tools frequently except to change batteries, so it should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Sabur

customer_reviews.title: Saves Me Time and Money!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a watch guy. I should have bought this years ago to replace watch batteries. I always thought it was a more complicated process, but after watching a few videos I ordered this. I have done three now and it saves me A LOT of time and money running to a jeweler. Most watches take one or two battery sizes. I bought a pack of both and keep them on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Zeek

customer_reviews.title: It's a great kit
customer_reviews.text: This really is a great kit. In my opinion it's a professional kit for changing batteries and bands. It has everything I need for changing batteries and more. It is extremely well made. I already changed three batteries on three different watches. Very easy to use and as I said very professional. I'll never pay again to change a battery. It was delivered when promised. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Great toolkit for amateur watch repair work.
customer_reviews.text: All the necessary tools are included for simple to medium complexity watch repair. It was easy for me to open a few watches I had from my "younger" days and either change the battery or air clean the inside/outside, or fix the bracelet. Pretty good capability for the price when you consider that a nice watch cleaning can run you near $100.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Denis

customer_reviews.title: A Great Selection of Tools
customer_reviews.text: I used this toolkit to replace the battery in my watch. The kit contains a comprehensive set of tools for battery changes, band adjustments, etc. I watched a few YouTube videos to learn the exact procedure for changing the battery in my watch, and this procedural knowledge combined with this kit gave me the confidence to complete the repair.
customer_reviews.author: BrewersFan1955

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch Repair Kit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this kit because I had quite a few watches which needed new batteries. This is a great kit! I used the tools necessary to change the batteries in several watches and it was easy to open the watches and switch out the old and new batteries. There are tools for removing links from watch straps also but I will do that at another time. Great value in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Missouri Gardener

customer_reviews.title: A great watch repair kit.  Tools for almost everything.
customer_reviews.text: This watch repair case give me every tool I needed to open the watches (5 different watches) and change the battery. That is what I wanted it for. The only thing missing was a tool to close the back after opening it. I finally went on YouTube.com and found a video that taught me how to do it with the simple tools I had at home. The instruction booklet could have been more descriptive, but I can figure most things out. I also know how to go on the internet or YouTube.com and find the instructions I need, Was well worth the money. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Little LuLu

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to tighten up a seiko watch, I. Any get it to work all the way the tool seems no to be thin enough however I had no problem opening the watch with the tool provided. This seems like a very good kit. I think the problem is the user since I don’t know what I’m doing. It does look really good and the tools are nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Edgaba

customer_reviews.title: Good even for a novice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kit to just replace batteries and clean the inside of my watch on occasion along with adjust the watch band on my watches this kits does a good job of doing all I want for now until I learn more about watch repair If you looking to do the basics I recommend this kit not sure about if its professional or not but I suspect it can get the job done
customer_reviews.author: Bowleglewie

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It has almost everything you'll ever need to repair a watch band or to replace batteries. The watch back removal tool is kinda chincy with lots of slop in the mechanism but it gets the job done. The mini vice doesn't work to we'll If you have heavier watches which are on the thick side but other than that the kits should last for a bit. For what you get it's good value.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Really useful for home. I purchased a watch & used this kit to remove the links to make the watch fit as well as remove the back for replacing the battery on another watch. The instructions were a little confusing but I pulled up a video which walked me through it. The kit had everything I needed and I would recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love watches and have quite a few of them. Recently, about 10 of my watches all needed new batteries. I usually pay upwards of $15 for each watch battery replacement so it adds up quickly. I bought this kit and a new battery for one watch to start out with. My boyfriend changed it out for me within 5-10 minutes! That is amazing for someone that has never touched a watch repair kit--super easy to do! I haven't tried it yet but I know it'll be super easy to do! This kit will pay for itself on the next watch I do already!
customer_reviews.author: Alvina Ahlers

customer_reviews.title: Great tools for the money
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the price of the product. Quality is Ok and will get simple jobs done easily. This is not a high quality German made watch tool kit, but great product for the average guy to do simple work on his/her watches. I bought this to repair one automatic watch , and to replace batteries in two other watches. All watches are fixed!
customer_reviews.author: GK5040Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A watch starter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was recommended by one of the YouTube channels I watch regarding watches, my intent was just to open the watch change batteries if needed and bracketed. It does the job, the only thing I would have preferred was to be given options of pins, they seem a bit flimsy, easy to bend, did not come with any screw down pins either, I would have paid more for the quality pins.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzie

customer_reviews.title: nice kit, saved me a trip to the jeweler
customer_reviews.text: The second and minute hands started touching after I dropped my watch so it stopped working. I put it in a drawer 6 months ago and had given up on fixing it after several unsuccessful attempt to visit my local jeweler. The jeweler closes on the weekends and it's hard to visit during the week. The repair kit was inexpensive and it includes tools to open the back screw-on cover. I surprised myself by doing the repair on my own after watching a YouTube how-to. I'm happy I got this kit, I'm wearing my watch today. I have also used it to repair another watch with a snap on cover. The second watch needed a battery replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Cantu

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: It gets expensive getting the batteries changed in My Wife's watch collection and this was just what the doctor ordered. I now order the batteries from Amazon and use this to open the watches and change them myself. The tools aren't Jeweler quality but they work just fine in my amateurish 77 year old fingers. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Deknoop

customer_reviews.title: Lots of useful tools
customer_reviews.text: The package had a lot of useful tools. I am repairing (mainly changing batteries) for lots of watches donated to a thrift store. I had zero experience doing this. Having the right tools makes a lot of difference. I use them mainly to remove the backs from watches (pop off and screw off), replacing the battery, and getting the back on watertight. Also changes watch bands. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: texmit

customer_reviews.title: The tools are fragile, the tools break easily and are poorly constructed
customer_reviews.text: The tools are fragile, the tools break easily and are poorly constructed. The things that should be easily adjusted for precision use are clunky and anything but precise. And the heavy bulky tools to survive torque with opposing fulcrum break. It is easy to use but agrivating and that equates stress and that is not good when attempting watch repair
customer_reviews.author: Rufus Cleetus Ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: If you need quality screwdrivers, look elsewhere...
customer_reviews.text: Another cheap kit, more cheap screwdrivers that aren't worth a damn. To elaborate, if you have a watch with screw-down collars on your band, the screwdrivers are poorly machined and will not grip the screw to allow you to make a size adjustment on your bracelet. Do a little research and spend a few extra bucks on quality tools to avoid damaging your bracelets. If you have a cheaper watch with simple push pins, you're fine with the tool that is included.
customer_reviews.author: Arp716

customer_reviews.title: Just a bag of cheap junk.
customer_reviews.text: This product defines cheap quality. It is one of the abysmally awful products that I have ever had the misfortune of buying. The tips for removing watch links (which is why most people will but this product) bend so easily that I managed to ruin 3 trying to get a particularly stubborn pin out. Do no buy this. Do no believe the positive reviews. It is horrible. Do yourself a favor a spend a bit more money on something higher quality before you end up wasting it instead.
customer_reviews.author: fromabovetheunderground

customer_reviews.title: material quality........meh.
customer_reviews.text: Good luck if you have screws that need extra torque....the supplied flat heads are soft like butter. Add torque and they start to twist at the blade and get distorted. Had to dig in my junk drawer. Found a solid mini screwdriver (MADE IN USA) that did the trick. Holy cow.
customer_reviews.author: Cee

customer_reviews.title: Right Tools for the job
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with the watch repair kit. It comes with everything you need to fix basically any watch. It has already paid for itself since I have fixed 5 of my watches. In the past, the watch repairman would charge me $8-10 per watch batter and labor. I would've paid $40-50 bucks for the 5 watches! Each batter costs around $2-5, so with the kit and batteries, repairing my watches only cost me $30. Definitely a great kit and well worth the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Z

customer_reviews.title: Two of the primary components broke my first time using it.
customer_reviews.text: Both the watch band pin remover and the hammer broke on the first watch I used this kit on. I'm giving two stars because the kit included other tools that allowed me to get the job done, but unfortunately the primary tools I bought this kit for were so low quality they broke extremely easily. I'm familiar with resizing watches so this was not user error or brute force.
customer_reviews.author: Julian P

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toolkit so I could replace the battery in my Tag Heur Link. It took some fiddling to get the wrench set just right to unscrew the back of the watch but it was a success. The quality of this toolkit is fair but at the rate I use it, it will last forever! Can't beat the price - happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: rbgiantfan

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, but several tools broke within a week
customer_reviews.text: Watch kit has all the tools you need and more for basic repairs or adjustments. I bought mine to adjust some stainless steel straps on some watches I had. Only problem I have is that several of the tools have already broke within the short time I've had them. If you need a repair kit that you will seldom use, then I would suggest this. If you are looking for one for everyday or weekly use, then this kit might not be durable enough for it.
customer_reviews.author: Quentin

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner watch repair kit
customer_reviews.text: I decided that I would like to try to make some repairs on some less expensive watches that I own. I saw this listed at a very reasonable price so I decided to pick it up. I have to say, I use a number of the items in the kit a lot. It has 3 case openers, all of which I've used. It has a nice variety of spring bars too in case you need to replace any. There are tools in there that I don't know what they do! :) For a beginner, I would definitely recommend this kit. For any type of expert or advanced watch repair person, this wouldn't be helpful I imagine.
customer_reviews.author: WatchWithPete

customer_reviews.title: Terrific value for those who know how to use them!
customer_reviews.text: I actually like these tools very much! It REALLY beats taking my watches to the jeweler's to pay for someone else to do exactly the same thing I can do, all by myself, such as taking links out of my watch bands/changing the bands or replacing batteries. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Shadowfreak

customer_reviews.title: Great value if your watch is plain, like a Casio.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced 4 watch batteries on day one.... I tried it on another watch and the kit failed me. It felt flimbsy on that watch. So I decided to return it. It did not work on that particular watch (Tissot). The work on the previous watches was a matter of unscrewing some screws (Casio).
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: I will never go to a Jeweler again. The kits paid for itself in no time. Gave it 4 stars because the directions are not very clear. I had to Goggle how to use a lot of the tools. Overall, a great buy. You will need to purchase a additional tool for some watch’s where the backs need more pressure to close.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed&Highly_Favored

customer_reviews.title: Read instructions and be patient
customer_reviews.text: I bought a variety of watch batteries, I would have wasted my money had I not purchased this watch repair kit. Between my wife and I we probably have 30+ watches, few are very expensive, but all need batteries at one time or another. Now I can change them myself!
customer_reviews.author: Warren Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great value for watch hoarders and collectors!
customer_reviews.text: As an avid watch collector, I am always looking for and finding second hand watches. Many times these watches only need a little TLC and a battery replaced. With this product I have easily repaired many watches in my collection. It is definitely easy to use and a lot cheaper then paying a jeweler to the job. This kit pays for itself with only 3 watch repair jobs. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Okie M

customer_reviews.title: unbelievable value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I got this kit to attempt to replace a watch battery rather than go to a jeweler. I was amazed at all the various tools and supplies. I was expecting much less quality considering the low price. I was impressed with quality of everything packed into the zipper case. Wow !
customer_reviews.author: Kate ONeill

customer_reviews.title: It is efficient and a must have.
customer_reviews.text: This set has many uses. It is easy to transport fits in a bag, toolbox, or simply your glove compartment so at this point why waste cash taking your watches to a jeweler for a simple fix that you can DIY. You will find most useful what I call the sticky thongs perfect for grabbing the mini-screws or parts you just can retrieve with your fingers.
customer_reviews.author: stephen alleyne

product_meta.title: Vastar Watch Repair Kit, Watch Repair Tools Professional Spring Bar Tool Set, Watch Band Link Pin Tool Set with Carrying Case
feature_bullets: The complete 151pcs watch repair tool kit suit for both professional and general use, solutions for most watch repair requirements
The Vastar new case opener adjustable up to 52mm, easy to open regular and oversized watches, perfect for watchmakers, collectors, durable, portable, practical, convenient and very easy to use
Updated a metal watchband remover, watch repair tools help you get your watch problem done at home instead of going for watch repair shops

With an operation manual, the high quality watch repair set perfect for professional and beginner to do common tasks like opening watch backs, watchband adjustment, changing watch batteries, gaskets, adjusting bands and more
Come with a black nylon carrying zipper case for the sake of convenient storage, easy to take care of them and get the job done by anywhere

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,476 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
